page.title: 17Games We Play.
page.content:
STUCK IN THE MUD. Stuck in the mud is another favourite game to play at playtimes.It is similar to Tig,but when you get caught you have to stand still with either your legs apart or your arms up.To be freed someone has to go under your legs or your arms.When you have been had three times you are had for the next game.
FRENCH SKIPPING (ELASTIC). Three or more people can play this game.You have a long piece of elastic which you tie the ends together.One person stands either end of the elastic.Somebody jumps in and out of the elastic in a special sequence.If you do it wrong,you are out and another person has a go.The object of the game is to see how high you can jump over the elastic.
